name: Be Free - An App That Allows Non-Speakers to Communicate Freely
description: Be Free is an application designed for individuals who are unable to communicate verbally. Users can select a conversation scenario, and the app will recognize the other party's voice. AI assists in constructing responses, which are then delivered vocally. This project aims to provide useful service insights for those living without a voice.
